Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering this product to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the premium value we place on delivering excellence. I trust that you will find the investment worthwhile and appreciate the opportunity to discuss how this product can positively impact your business or lifestyle. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
